page.title: 12Potteries Marathon
page.content: This is an annual event and usually takes place in the middle of July.Thousnds of people take part, both young and old with one objective in mind and that is to finish. The race leaders came through Weston Coyney at about 10-30 a.m.just thirty minutes after starting from Trentham.They covered the first six miles in just thirty minutes.Fifteen minutes later they came through thick and fast.The last went through at 11-25a.m. Many thousands of people were out on the streets of Meir and Weston Coyney to cheer all the runners.It is a great day for everyone to enjoy themselves,the pubs are open all day and many of them organise parties and barbeques for all the family to enjoy. Gillian Lomax
